title: Star - Kang Min Hyuk
lyrics: intro: - - Haneure bitnadon byori Jo molli bitnadon byori Ne mame neryowannabwa Gaseume segyojin byori Gaseume bitnadon byori Ama noin-got gata Ttollineun soriga deullini O star   Yo my star ~ Aju oren mon yetnalbuto na kkumkkwowatdon sarangi Noin-gol ara Onjena hamkke hejwo Aju oren siganeul-lodo Neul gateun jarieso bitna jugil Nemam noegeman billyojulge - - - - Gaseume segyojin byori Gaseume bitnadon byori Ama noin-got gata Nimamsoge segyojin byoldo Nimamsok bitnadon byoldo  Nemam noman barabolgoya Tto nodo namaneul barabwa julle  (pause) - - - - -
